text: Remove the rind from the oranges using a zester. Remove the white pith from both the oranges and the grapefruit. Dice the citrus flesh. Put the oranges, grapefruit, sliced spring onions, washed cherry tomatoes, chopped chillies, prepared herbs and rocket into a large salad bowl.  Prepare the dressing. Mix together the ingredients for the dressing using a spoon or whisk. Season with freshly ground pepper and sea salt if wished. Pour the dressing over the salad. Toss gently. Serve. Great accompanied with crusty bread and barbecue food. Finished.
